Introduction

NEKIRU (a shortening of the Japanese sentence "Nee, kiiteru?" (meaning "Hey, are you listening?"), is a South Korean indie idol group who originally debuted on April 27, 2019, but rebranded in July 2020 with a new line-up and redebuted on November 13, 2020 with the mini album HELLO. The EP was co-written, co-composed and co-produced by VOID members TOA and J.Robyn. The group is active in South Korea and in Japan.
